verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Away in a manger no crib for a bed
The little Lord Jesus laid down
His sweet head, the stars in the sky
Looked down where He lay
The little Lord Jesus asleep
On the hay

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The cattle are lowing, the baby awakes
But little Lord Jesus, no crying
He makes, I love Thee Lord Jesus!
Look down from the sky and stay
By my cradle til morning is nigh

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
It's Christmas!
The angels are singing
And I know the reason, the
Saviour is born
It's Christmas!
The bells are ringing
And I feel like shouting
Joy to the world!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Be near me, Lord Jesus I ask Thee to stay
Close by me forever and love me I pray
Bless all the dear children
In Thy tender care
And fit us for heaven
To live with Thee there

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
It's Christmas!

It's Christmas!

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Go tell it on the mountain,
Over the hills and everywhere!
Go, tell it on the mountain that
Jesus Christ is born!
